Description.Text:
In the rolling hills of the Santa Monica Mountains near Malibu sits Sheraton Agoura Hills Hotel. Experience the upside of everything as Sheraton hotel puts guests far enough from the hustle and bustle of the Los Angeles area for a peaceful escape, but close enough to easily take pleasure in popular California attractions like Zuma Beach or savor the flavors local Agoura Hills restaurants.
Facility Includes : - Complimentary Self Parking - Wireless internet $ 9.00 (Subject to change) - Coffee/tea maker - Iron/ironing board - Hair dryer - Handheld showerhead - Rollaway beds available - Multi-line phone with voicemail - Outdoor Heated Pool - Fitness Center - Business Services - Golf onsite
- Minimum check-in age is 21 - 100% Non-Smoking Guestrooms
